BodyName: Committee on Civil and Human Rights
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Consumer and Worker Protection.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Consumer and Worker Protection

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to forbidding agreements to shorten the period in which claims and complaints of unlawful discriminatory practices, harassment or violence may be filed and in which civil actions may be commenced
Items.MatterName: Forbidding agreements to shorten the period in which claims and complaints of unlawful discriminatory practices, harassment or violence may be filed and in which civil actions may be commenced.

Items.Title: Oversight - Fair Lending Practices Enforcement – Steps to Financial Equity.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Fair Lending Practices Enforcement – Steps to Financial Equity.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting discrimination in the issuance of credit and requiring creditors to disclose to potential borrowers how their rate is calculated
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting discrimination in the issuance of credit and requiring creditors to disclose to potential borrowers how their rate is calculated.
